Topic.Title: Going Long On YHOO Who Is With Me?

Message.Msg: Luckily, I sold my HPQ and bought YHOO. Since then they almost swapped stock prices. I like YHOO cuz I think Marissa is better than Meg W. Ebay could be run by a #$%$ and still make money. The shift from Ebay to HP is much greater than Google to Yahoo. The content IS awesome. I used to play chess on yhoo, too. Maybe I will return.

Topic.Title: Very small volume today on small down. But why isn't YHOO buying at these levels and...

Message.Msg: I can not say if YHOO bought stock Friday, but I would question why YHOO would want the price higher. seems logical to me that on low volume days they would ease off buying in order NOT to drive up the price by creating more demand. I totally agree that stock buybacks of significent size, when the stock is undervalued, will eventually increase the stock price.

Topic.Title: Yahoo to Layoff 1500 Employees

Message.Msg: More layoffs will follow but they will not outnumber new hires. Yahoo will only reduce total headcount by 1500.

Topic.Title: Very small volume today on small down. But why isn't YHOO buying at these levels and...

Message.Msg: But why isn't YHOO buying at these levels and keeping the price above $16 and moving up? Because it is illegal. And if they buy back shares and retire them it does not make YHOO worth more per share. The cash Yahoo uses to buy shares is no longer a part of the value of Yahoo; the total value of Yahoo goes down giving you the same value per share. There are no hocus-pocus juggling tricks that can make the value of Yahoo grow. The last $3 billion buyback did nothing for the share price. No free money.

Topic.Title: Update on feedback and action taken by message board team

Message.Msg: Each report abuse post is manually moderated with 24 hours of SLA.

Message.Title: Earnings CC and News
Message.Msg: On Oct 22, Yahoo will announce Q3 earnings. Conference call will follow with details. This CC would be excellent event to discuss what they will do with the $3 billion. Will it be dividend, buyback or both. I expect increased volatility and a little pps increase on days proceeding The Call. LOL

Topic.Title: Earnings CC and News

Message.Msg: Yahoo will also shed more light on Mayer's plan for Yahoo's future.

Topic.Title: What did you say when coldone told you to buy at $11, $12, $13 and $14, hotmodel?

Message.Msg: Just last year coldone told you to buy at $18 then it fell to the 17s and coldone told you to buy at $17 then it fell to the 16s and coldone told you to buy at $16 then it fell to the 15s and coldone told you to buy at $15 then it fell to the 14s and coldone told you to buy at $14 then it fell to the 13s and coldone told you to buy at $13 then it fell to the 12s and coldone told you to buy at $12 then it fell to the 11s and coldone told you to buy at $11 and for the first and last time since $28 Coldone was right! But after heavy buying at $28, $26. $24, $22, $20, $19, $18 and every time he called bottom all he could do were phantom buys begging everyone to buy and ease his huge crushing losses. 4+ years waiting for his all in at $28 and backing up the truck at $26 buys to make him rich. It has been a pleasure spending his and his followersâ€™ money. And we look forward to years of the same.
